-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/augustunderground/plotly-hs#readme</a>
@package plotly-hs
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Internal Functions and Types for Plotly Plots in Haskell
module Graphics.Plotly.Internal

-- | Config to Layout
fromConfig :: PlotConfig -> Layout

-- | Internal Type Alias
type Script = ByteString

-- | Prints "null" for Nothing, works good with JSON
showMaybe :: Show a => Maybe a -> String

-- | Takes a Script and inserts it into the default HTML template
toHtml :: Script -> ByteString

-- | Layout Margins
data Margin
Margin :: !Int -> !Int -> !Int -> !Int -> Margin

-- | Left Margin
[$sel:l:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Right Margin
[$sel:r:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Bottom Margin
[$sel:b:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Top Margin
[$sel:t:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Layout for Plots
data Layout
Layout :: !String -> !Maybe Axis -> !Maybe Axis -> !Maybe BarMode -> !Int -> !Int -> !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe Margin -> Layout

-- | Plot Title
[$sel:title:Layout] :: Layout -> !String

-- | X Axis Layout
[$sel:xaxis:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Axis

-- | Y Axis Layout
[$sel:yaxis:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Axis

-- | Bar Chart Layout
[$sel:barmode:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe BarMode

-- | Plot Height in Pixels
[$sel:height:Layout] :: Layout -> !Int

-- | Plot Width in Pixels
[$sel:width:Layout] :: Layout -> !Int

-- | Show a Legend
[$sel:showlegend:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Margins
[$sel:margin:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Margin

-- | Axis Type
data AxisType

-- | Linear Axis (default)
Linear :: AxisType

-- | Logarithmic Axis
Log :: AxisType

-- | Date Axis
Date :: AxisType

-- | Categorical Axis
Category :: AxisType

-- | Multi Category Axis (?)
MultiCategory :: AxisType

-- | Axis Layout
data Axis
Axis :: !String -> !Bool -> !Bool -> !AxisType -> Axis

-- | Axis Label
[$sel:title:Axis] :: Axis -> !String

-- | Enable Grid
[$sel:showGrid:Axis] :: Axis -> !Bool

-- | Enable Zero Line
[$sel:zeroLine:Axis] :: Axis -> !Bool

-- | Axis Type
[$sel:type':Axis] :: Axis -> !AxisType

-- | Marker Config
data Marker
Marker :: !Double -> !Symbol -> !Double -> Marker

-- | Marker Size
[$sel:size:Marker] :: Marker -> !Double

-- | Marker Symbol
[$sel:symbol:Marker] :: Marker -> !Symbol

-- | Marker Opacity
[$sel:opacity:Marker] :: Marker -> !Double

-- | Data Trace
data Trace
Trace :: !Maybe String -> ![Double] -> !Maybe [Double] -> !Maybe [Double] -> !Maybe Mode -> !Type -> !Maybe Marker -> Trace

-- | Trace Name
[$sel:name:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe String

-- | X axis values
[$sel:x:Trace] :: Trace -> ![Double]

-- | Y axis values
[$sel:y:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe [Double]

-- | Z axis values
[$sel:z:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe [Double]

-- | Scatter Mode
[$sel:mode:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe Mode

-- | Plot Type
[$sel:type':Trace] :: Trace -> !Type

-- | Marker Configuration
[$sel:marker:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe Marker

-- | Heatmap Trace
data TraceH
TraceH :: ![[Double]] -> !Maybe [String] -> !Maybe [String] -> !Type -> !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe ColorScale -> TraceH

-- | Data Matrix
[$sel:z:TraceH] :: TraceH -> ![[Double]]

-- | Y labels
[$sel:x:TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Maybe [String]

-- | Y Labels
[$sel:y:TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Maybe [String]

-- | Heatmap
[$sel:type':TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Type

-- | Hover on Gaps
[$sel:hoverOnGaps:TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Show scale Bar
[$sel:showScale:TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Color Scale
[$sel:colorScale:TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Maybe ColorScale

-- | Plot Type
data Type

-- | Scatter Plot
Scatter :: Type

-- | Histogram
Histogram :: Type

-- | Heatmap
Heatmap :: Type

-- | 3D Scatter
Scatter3D :: Type

-- | 3D Surface
Surface :: Type

-- | Scatter Mode
data Mode

-- | Draw Lines
Lines :: Mode

-- | Draw Markers only
Markers :: Mode

-- | Draw Both
LinesMarkers :: Mode

-- | Marker Symbols
data Symbol
Circle :: Symbol
CircleOpen :: Symbol
Cross :: Symbol
Diamond :: Symbol
DiamondOpen :: Symbol
Square :: Symbol
SquareOpen :: Symbol
X :: Symbol

-- | Color scales for Heamap / 3D Plots
data ColorScale
Blackbody :: ColorScale
Bluered :: ColorScale
Blues :: ColorScale
Cividis :: ColorScale
Earth :: ColorScale
Electric :: ColorScale
Greens :: ColorScale
Greys :: ColorScale
Hot :: ColorScale
Jet :: ColorScale
Picnic :: ColorScale
Portland :: ColorScale
Rainbow :: ColorScale
RdBu :: ColorScale
Reds :: ColorScale
Viridis :: ColorScale
YlGnBu :: ColorScale
YlOrRd :: ColorScale

-- | Bar Layout
data BarMode

-- | Stacked
Stack :: BarMode

-- | Grouped
Group :: BarMode

-- | Overlayed
Overlay :: BarMode

-- | Relative
Relative :: BarMode

-- | Trace Independent Plot Config
data PlotConfig
PlotConfig :: !String -> !String -> !String -> !AxisType -> !AxisType -> !BarMode -> !Mode -> !ColorScale -> !Bool -> !Int -> !Int -> !Margin -> !Marker -> PlotConfig

-- | Plot Title (default "")
[$sel:title':PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | X Axis Label (default "")
[$sel:xlabel:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | Y Axis Label (default "")
[$sel:ylabel:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | X Axis Type (default Linear)
[$sel:xmode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !AxisType

-- | Y Axis Type (default Linear)
[$sel:ymode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !AxisType

-- | Bar Mode (default Stack)
[$sel:barMode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !BarMode

-- | Line Mode (default Linear)
[$sel:lineMode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Mode

-- | Color Scale for 3D (default Viridis)
[$sel:colorScale:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !ColorScale

-- | Show Legend (default True)
[$sel:legend:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Bool

-- | Canvas Height in Pixels (default 800)
[$sel:height:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Int

-- | Canvas Width in Pixels (default 800)
[$sel:width:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Int

-- | Layout margin (default 0 0 0 0)
[$sel:margin:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Margin

-- | Marker (default 0.5 Circle 1.0)
[$sel:marker:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Marker

-- | Default <tt>PlotConfig</tt>
defaultConfig :: PlotConfig

-- | Generates line for <tt>data</tt> variable for <tt>N</tt> traces
traceData :: Int -> Script

-- | Generates line for <tt>i</tt>th <tt>trace</tt> variable
traceLine :: ToJSON a => a -> Int -> ByteString

-- | Converts layout and list of traces to <tt>Script</tt> for insertion
--   into HTML
toScript :: ToJSON a => Maybe Layout -> [a] -> ByteString

-- | Trace contructor, different order of arguments
mkTrace :: Maybe String -> Maybe Mode -> Maybe Marker -> Type -> [Double] -> [Double] -> [Double] -> Trace

-- | Heatmap Trace constructor
mkTraceH :: ColorScale -> Bool -> Bool -> [String] -> [String] -> [[Double]] -> TraceH
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Margin
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Margin
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Margin
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Margin
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Margin
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.AxisType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.AxisType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.AxisType
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.AxisType
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.AxisType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Axis
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Axis
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Type
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Type
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Type
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Type
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Mode
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Mode
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Mode
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Mode
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Symbol
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Symbol
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Symbol
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Marker
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Marker
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Marker
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Marker
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Trace
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Trace
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.ColorScale

instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.ColorScale
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.ColorScale
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.ColorScale
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.TraceH
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.BarMode
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.BarMode
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.BarMode
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.BarMode
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Layout
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Layout
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Layout
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Layout
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.PlotConfig
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.BarMode
instance GHC.Read.Read Graphics.Plotly.Internal.BarMode
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.TraceH
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.TraceH
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Trace
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Trace
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Symbol
instance GHC.Read.Read Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Symbol
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Mode

instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Type
instance GHC.Read.Read Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Type
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Axis
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Axis


-- | Plotly Plots in Haskell
module Graphics.Plotly

-- | Save Plot to HTML File
plot :: FilePath -> Script -> IO ()

-- | Scatter Plot with individual x values per trace
scatter' :: [String] -> [[Double]] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | Scatter Plot with same x axis for all ys
scatter :: [String] -> [Double] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | Histogram Plot
hist :: [String] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | Heatmap Plot
heatmap :: [String] -> [String] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | 3D Scatter Plot
scatter3d :: [String] -> [[Double]] -> [[Double]] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | Internal Type Alias
type Script = ByteString

-- | Scatter Mode
data Mode

-- | Draw Lines
Lines :: Mode

-- | Draw Markers only
Markers :: Mode

-- | Draw Both
LinesMarkers :: Mode

-- | Plot Type
data Type

-- | Scatter Plot
Scatter :: Type

-- | Histogram
Histogram :: Type

-- | Heatmap
Heatmap :: Type

-- | 3D Scatter
Scatter3D :: Type

-- | 3D Surface
Surface :: Type

-- | Layout for Plots
data Layout
Layout :: !String -> !Maybe Axis -> !Maybe Axis -> !Maybe BarMode -> !Int -> !Int -> !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe Margin -> Layout

-- | Plot Title
[$sel:title:Layout] :: Layout -> !String

-- | X Axis Layout
[$sel:xaxis:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Axis

-- | Y Axis Layout
[$sel:yaxis:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Axis

-- | Bar Chart Layout
[$sel:barmode:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe BarMode

-- | Plot Height in Pixels
[$sel:height:Layout] :: Layout -> !Int

-- | Plot Width in Pixels
[$sel:width:Layout] :: Layout -> !Int

-- | Show a Legend
[$sel:showlegend:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Margins
[$sel:margin:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Margin

-- | Bar Layout
data BarMode

-- | Stacked
Stack :: BarMode

-- | Grouped
Group :: BarMode

-- | Overlayed
Overlay :: BarMode

-- | Relative
Relative :: BarMode

-- | Axis Type
data AxisType

-- | Linear Axis (default)
Linear :: AxisType

-- | Logarithmic Axis
Log :: AxisType

-- | Date Axis
Date :: AxisType

-- | Categorical Axis
Category :: AxisType

-- | Multi Category Axis (?)
MultiCategory :: AxisType

-- | Color scales for Heamap / 3D Plots
data ColorScale
Blackbody :: ColorScale
Bluered :: ColorScale
Blues :: ColorScale
Cividis :: ColorScale
Earth :: ColorScale
Electric :: ColorScale
Greens :: ColorScale
Greys :: ColorScale
Hot :: ColorScale
Jet :: ColorScale
Picnic :: ColorScale
Portland :: ColorScale
Rainbow :: ColorScale
RdBu :: ColorScale
Reds :: ColorScale
Viridis :: ColorScale
YlGnBu :: ColorScale
YlOrRd :: ColorScale

-- | Marker Symbols
data Symbol
Circle :: Symbol
CircleOpen :: Symbol
Cross :: Symbol
Diamond :: Symbol
DiamondOpen :: Symbol
Square :: Symbol
SquareOpen :: Symbol
X :: Symbol

-- | Trace Independent Plot Config
data PlotConfig
PlotConfig :: !String -> !String -> !String -> !AxisType -> !AxisType -> !BarMode -> !Mode -> !ColorScale -> !Bool -> !Int -> !Int -> !Margin -> !Marker -> PlotConfig

-- | Plot Title (default "")
[$sel:title':PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | X Axis Label (default "")
[$sel:xlabel:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | Y Axis Label (default "")
[$sel:ylabel:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | X Axis Type (default Linear)
[$sel:xmode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !AxisType

-- | Y Axis Type (default Linear)
[$sel:ymode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !AxisType

-- | Bar Mode (default Stack)
[$sel:barMode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !BarMode

-- | Line Mode (default Linear)
[$sel:lineMode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Mode

-- | Color Scale for 3D (default Viridis)
[$sel:colorScale:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !ColorScale

-- | Show Legend (default True)
[$sel:legend:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Bool

-- | Canvas Height in Pixels (default 800)
[$sel:height:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Int

-- | Canvas Width in Pixels (default 800)
[$sel:width:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Int

-- | Layout margin (default 0 0 0 0)
[$sel:margin:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Margin

-- | Marker (default 0.5 Circle 1.0)
[$sel:marker:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Marker

-- | Default <tt>PlotConfig</tt>
defaultConfig :: PlotConfig
